Articles.Content:
Hey, all!

I'm new-ish to the forum. I've been browsing on and off for quite some time (since 0.19?) and have played KSP on and off since 0.18. I found this game when a friend of mine was playing this in between finals at school and got me into getting the demo. Needless to say, I got hooked but not quite.

I've been really into KSP especially a lot lately since the more recent updates with more parts, science, and career mode! I'm a real amateur when it comes to exploring space, though. I don't play for a long enough period of a time to complete an actual mission, but now that finals are out of the way and high school has long since ended, I decided to dust off my KSP Shortcut on the desktop and finally actually play it for once!

Thought I'd finally make an account and start posting every so often.

Here is a recent mission I made in career mode to collect some science in Mun orbit:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

There are only three images because I didn't think to document at the time, but I definitely want to write stories in the future!

Mods I currently have installed (I don't necessarily use them often, if at all):

  • B9 Aerospace
  • Chatter
  • Hull Camera
  • Kerbal Attachment System
  • KSP Interstellar
  • KW Rocketry
  • Lazor Docking Camera

Edited January 31, 2014 by SilverMethod
Hello SilverMethod. It's nice that you have more time to play the game now.
I play stock, but I won't lie, Lazor cameras are pretty cool. I had that mod on my old computer.
Welcome to the forums! There is a lot of great stuff here. Be sure to check out the 'What did you do today in KSP?' thread and share your stories.
